name: Nightmare Game 2023
description:
Create a level out of your deck of level cards! Your goal is to go higher, but playing through more vertical levels is more difficult. Carefully choose new cards as you progress.

You jump higher the faster you move, so momentum is key!

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD - move

Z/Space - Jump

Click/Drag to edit level

Credits:

Jackson H

Evan S

Kaya T

Ray B
